articles.title: David Andrews believes this was most disappointing part of Patriots’ season-opening loss
articles.description:
"I just thought that was going to be a strength of this team."

The post David Andrews believes this was most disappointing part of Patriots’ season-opening loss appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: David Andrews criticized the Patriots' performance in their season opener on September 8.
Andrews expected the offensive line to be a team strength but was disappointed.
Local fans express frustration over the team's inability to meet expectations this season.

articles.title: Marco Sturm maps out the standard he’s setting for Bruins’ training camp
articles.description:
"We need all the players — and there will be a lot of opportunities."

The post Marco Sturm maps out the standard he’s setting for Bruins’ training camp appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Marco Sturm emphasizes high standards for Bruins' training camp starting September 2025.
Sturm highlights numerous opportunities for players to prove themselves during the camp.
Increased competition may enhance team performance, benefiting Boston fans this season.

articles.title: Worcester girl testifies against man accused of kidnapping her, throwing her off bridge
articles.description:
“I was thinking that he wanted me dead... If I breathed really lightly and quietly, he would think that I was dead and everything would stop.”

The post Worcester girl testifies against man accused of kidnapping her, throwing her off bridge appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Worcester girl testifies against her alleged kidnapper in court.
The incident involved a kidnapping and attempted murder on September 8, 2025.
Local residents express heightened concerns about safety following the trial.

articles.title: Drake Maye doesn’t think he has ‘too much on his plate’ and more from WEEI interview
articles.description:
"Being a quarterback in the NFL, there's going to be a lot on your plate no matter who you play for."

The post Drake Maye doesn’t think he has ‘too much on his plate’ and more from WEEI interview appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Drake Maye discusses NFL quarterback pressures in WEEI interview on September 8, 2025.
Maye emphasizes managing expectations, crucial for local fans of the New England Patriots.
His insights may influence how Boston fans perceive rookie quarterback challenges.
